meanings.definition: The action or process of collapsing inward violently.
meanings.sent1: The implosion of the building was so loud.
meanings.sent2: The implosion of the balloon startled everyone.
meanings.sent3: The implosion of the cake made for a messy but funny birthday party.
meanings.sent4: The implosion of the star created a beautiful burst of light.
meanings.sent5: The implosion of the soda can was like a mini explosion in reverse.

meanings.definition: A sudden failure or collapse of an organization or system.
meanings.sent1: The implosion of the company took everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent2: The economic implosion led to widespread unemployment.
meanings.sent3: The implosion of the school's lunch system caused chaos in the cafeteria.
meanings.sent4: The implosion of the team's strategy left them in disarray.
meanings.sent5: The implosion of the computer network brought the entire office to a standstill.
